name: Weekly Performance Review
prompt: Weekly performance review. Use botcore CLI to: 1) `botcore get_paper_performance` for overall stats. 2) `botcore get_tuning_dashboard` for tuning analysis. 3) `botcore get_adjustment_history '{"limit":20}'` for this week's changes. 4) `botcore get_paper_strategy_settings` for strategy breakdown. Create detailed report: weekly PnL, win rate, strategy comparison, adjustments made this week and impact, AI suggestions, action items for next week. For YELLOW-tier improvements, present as confirmable proposals.
